text: sētochini befetachihuna (ye‘īda) gīzēyachewini bederesu gīzē bemelikami yazuwachewi፤ (temaleswachewi) weyimi bemelikami ẖunēta āsenabituwachewi፡፡ lemegudatimi weseni talifabachewi zenidi ātiyazuwachewi፤ yihininimi yemīšera sewi nefisuni be’irigit’i bedele፡፡ ye’ālahinimi ānik’ets’ochi malagech’a ādirigachihu ātiyazu፡፡ ye’ālahinimi ts’ega benanite layi yaderegewini kemets’iḥāfina ket’ibebimi berisu yemīgesits’achihu sīẖoni benanite layi yaweredewini āsitawisu፡፡ ālahinimi firu፤ ālahimi negeruni hulu ‘āwak’ī meẖonuni ‘iwek’u፡፡
